1.0.name: wordpress/chatmeim-mini-messenger
1.0.description:
This plugin add the javascript code for Chatme.im Mini Messenger a Jabber/XMPP chat for your WordPress. It's a facebook-like chat based on Jabber/XMPP.

For more information, check out chatme.im and webchat.

Special Thanks:

  • Neustradamus for french translation
  • To my professor for moral support
  • To my sister for having tolerated
  • My doctor for support
  • My work for the economic support

Hand-crafted, and made with love, in Rosolina, Italy.

Based on Jappix and Jappix Mini.

For Every request visit our Forum
